name: Interdim Adventure
description:
a treasure hunt across worlds

You are given a strange device and an opportunity to unravel a cosmic mystery. You use this device to travel between parallel worlds in search of a treasure of unknown origin. This treasure has been scattered across many worlds and must be brought back together.

Originally only accessed by a select few as a secret project, it is finally unveiled as a snapshot of a 2014 project, slightly tweaked for a 2016 rebuild.

This was originally going to be the first big game of my newly established game studio, but seemed to be a little too big and complicated for me, so it was put on the backburner.
